entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
